title: Two Christian Reformed Pastors discussion Jordan Peterson
description:
My conversation with Rev Andrew Beunk of the New Westminster Christian Reformed Church in Burnaby BC Canada. http://www.nwcrc.ca/ 

We discuss how he became interested in JBP, why JBP is important, whether there is room for the JBP fans in his church and the importance of getting together in real life.
